snippet.title: DORAEMON STORY OF SEASONS – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Everyone's favorite robotic cat from the 22nd Century is coming in Doraemon Story of Seasons! See what new gadgets will help Noby be the best boy he can be!

Doraemon Story of Seasons is coming to #NintendoSwitch and PC in Autumn 2019. 

#Doraemon #StoryOfSeasons #BandaiNamco

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
